// nè¡¨ç¤ºæ•°ç»„arrayçš„é•¿åº¦
int find(int[] array, int n, int x) {
  int i = 0;
  int pos = -1;
  for (; i < n; ++i) {
    if (array[i] == x) pos = i;
  }
  return pos;
}

 // ä»£ç ä¸­çš„array.lengthå°±ç­‰äºn
 int[] array = new int[n];
 int count = 0;
 
 void insert(int val) {
    if (count == array.length) {
       int sum = 0;
       for (int i = 0; i < array.length; ++i) {
          sum = sum + array[i];
       }
       array[0] = sum;
       count = 1;
    }

    array[count] = val;
    ++count;
 }

struct queue {
int data[1000];
int head;
int tail;
};

struct stack
{
int data[10];
int top;
};


int main() {

struct queue a, b;
struct stack s;

int p[10], i, c = 0,* head,* tail,* r,temp;

//init
a.head = 0;
a.tail = 0;
b.head = 0;
b.tail = 0;
s.top = -1;


cout << "first array:" << endl;

for (i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
cin >> a.data[a.tail++];
}

cout << "second array:" << endl;

for (i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
cin >> b.data[b.tail++];
}



for (i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
p[i] = 0;
}

while (a.head != a.tail && b.head != b.tail) {

if (c % 2 == 0) {
head = &a.head;
tail = &a.tail;
r = a.data;
}
else {
head = &b.head;
tail = &b.tail;
r = b.data;
}

s.data[++s.top] = r[(*head)++];//Â³Ã¶Ã…Ã†
temp = s.data[s.top];
p[temp]++;//Â±ÃªÃ–Â¾Ã•Ã¢Ã•Ã…Ã…Ã†ÂµÃ„ÃŠÃ½ÃÂ¿

if (p[temp] > 1) {
r[(*tail)++] = s.data[s.top--];
while (s.data[s.top] != temp) {
p[s.data[s.top]]--;
r[(*tail)++] = s.data[s.top--];
}
p[temp]--;
}

c++;
}

if (a.head == a.tail) {
cout << "b victory!" << endl;
}
else {
cout << "a victory!" << endl;
}

return 0;
}

int cal(int n) {
int sum_1 = 0;
int p = 1;
for (; p < 100; ++p) {
sum_1 = sum_1 + p;
}

int sum_2 = 0;
int q = 1;
for (; q < n; ++q) {
sum_2 = sum_2 + q;
}

int sum_3 = 0;
int i = 1;
int j = 1;
for (; i <= n; ++i) {
j = 1;
for (; j <= n; ++j) {
sum_3 = sum_3 + i * j;
}
}

return sum_1 + sum_2 + sum_3;
}

int[] array = new int[n];
int count = 0;

void insert(int val) {
if (count == array.length) {
int sum = 0;
for (int i = 0; i < array.length; ++i) {
sum = sum + array[i];
}
array[0] = sum;
count = 1;
}

array[count] = val;
++count;
